description: This file serves as the server-side rendering (SSR) entry point for a Qwik-based React application. It imports necessary functions and components, and defines a default function to render the main 'Root' component to a stream with specified options and attributes.

methods.name: default (function)
methods.description: The default exported function that takes rendering options and returns the result of rendering the Root component to a stream with specified manifest, container attributes, and server data.
